markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Red Fox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1158)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The shy and perceptive red fox has uncanny adaptability and is just as comfortable in urban areas as in the wilds. Red foxes typically have rust-red fur, a white underbelly, and a characteristic white-tipped bushy tail. They are omnivorous, and eat insects, lizards, and small birds, pouncing on their prey to catch it. Because these opportunistic hunters see eggs and captive livestock as an easy meal, many farmers see them as foes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Red Fox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1158)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 102</row>

**Perception** +7; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6–2 piercing

**Leaping Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />   The red fox either Strides or [Leaps](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) up to its Speed and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the fox began this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-236" />
name: Red Fox

Because these opportunistic hunters see eggs and captive livestock as an easy meal, many farmers see them as foes.
